title: Голодомор
overview: From July to September 2020, the Holodomor Museum and Ukraїner carried out a large-scale expedition to Ukraine in search of Holodomor witnesses. The team visited 64 settlements in 33 districts, where they recorded the testimonies of 120 eyewitnesses of the Holodomor, talked to 50 local historians and discovered 66 mass graves for victims of genocide. The project, implemented with the support of the Ukrainian Cultural Foundation, is called "The Holodomor: Mosaics of History."
